channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bessent says new rare earth factory will cut costs, break China’s 'chokehold' on industry
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent highlights South Carolina's rare earth facility as economic win, creating jobs and cutting costs under President Dona...

item.title: ‘You can’t expect people to go in to work when they’re not getting a paycheck’: Travelers sympathize despite 800 downed Friday flights
item.description: The 40 airports selected for the slowdown span over two dozen states and include hubs such as Atlanta, Dallas, Denver, LA and Charlotte.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Saturday, November 8
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Trump ‘failed to consider the harms’ on SNAP benefits by withholding food aid during shutdown, judge rules
item.description: Find the money to fully fund SNAP benefits for November, the judge told the White House, which promptly appealed.

item.title: ‘They ain’t worried about the miners or people in West Virginia or coal miners anywhere’: Black lung sufferers despair over DC’s distance
item.description: The two reddest states in America — Wyoming and West Virginia — had the highest overall worker death rates in 2023, according to government figures.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Saturday, November 8 Clues And Answers (#881)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: iPhone Users Warned — If You See This ‘Helpful’ Message, Do Not Reply
item.description: Security experts have issued a critical warning as a new Find My message-based attack hits iPhone users — what you need to know.

item.title: Government shutdown delays October jobs report: when will economic reports be released after shutdown ends?
item.description: The longest government shutdown in U.S. history continues to disrupt economic data releases with the October jobs report delayed until after the shutd...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani visits Puerto Rico for annual NYC political power broker summit
item.description: The conference is something of a post-Election Day retreat for the state’s political movers and shakers at a Hilton hotel in San Juan.

item.title: Amazon Confirms WorkSpaces Linux Client Authentication Issue
item.description: Amazon has released a cloud security update after it confirmed a high-severity vulnerability that could expose Linux WorkSpaces authentication tokens.

item.title: Trump cozies up to Central Asian leaders in hunt for rare earths resources
item.description: Trump and the officials from Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan held bilateral meetings in the Oval Office.

item.title: Layoffs in October hit highest level for month in 22 years as companies cite cost-cutting, AI
item.description: U.S. employers announced 153,074 job cuts in October 2025, marking a 175% increase from the previous year and the highest total for the month of Octob...

item.title: FAA confirms which 40 markets will have airline traffic cut 10%
item.description: The FAA orders 10% flight reductions at 40 major U.S. airports starting Friday due to air traffic controller shortages during the government shutdown.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
